title: Liquorice Mint Nicotine Pouches by Ace
description: TRY ACE LIQUORICE MINT NICOTINE POUCHES Liquorice Mint Nicotine Pouches by Ace feature the classic flavour of liquorice candy with a menthol twist, making it perfect for all aniseed lovers. Ace Superwhite Liquorice is a strong and slim nicotine pouch with a taste of liquorice and mint. The pouch is chalk-white and offers a dry and discreet profile. View all Ace Nicotine Pouches View all Mint/Menthol Pouches View all Stong Pouches View all Medium Pouches KEY FEATURES: Liquorice/Aniseed and menthol flavoured nicotine pouches Designed for a strong nicotine kick Great substitute for cigarettes 16MG Per Gram | 9.6MG Per Pouch Tobacco-free, smoke-free and vapour-free Suitable for all environments MORE ABOUT LIQUORICE FLAVOURED NICOTINE POUCHES Ace's X Cool Mint nicotine pouches pack a serious punch with their high nicotine content and intense menthol flavour. These pouches aren't for the faint hearted and are suitable for experience nicotine pouch users. MORE ABOUT ACE NICOTINE POUCHES Liquorice Mint Nicotine Pouches by Ace offer a naturally flavoursome experience, melding the flavours of liquorice and menthol perfectly. The sweetness of the aniseed and refreshing flavours of the mint provides a beautifully authentic experience. Ace's pouches are for experienced users and are available in a range of flavours, so make sure you check out the rest of the range. Additional Description Information: Brand Name: Ace Product Type: Nicotine Pouches Pouch Format: Slim Our Strength Rating: Strong Nicotine (mg/pouch): 9.6MG Nicotine (mg/Gram): 16MG Flavour Name: Liquorice Mint Flavour: Mint & Menthol Pouches per can: 20 Shipping from: London, UK
